ui_disease.tree2table: SELECT `data_attr_data`.`pid` as `pid`,`p_data_attr_data`.`data` as `pd`, `data_attr_data`.`sid` as `mid`,`data_attr_data`.`data` as `md`, `data_attr_data`.`key` as `url` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_data` `p_data_attr_data` ON `data_attr_data`.`pid` = `p_data_attr_data`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = 2 AND `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 1;
